title: Is it possible to create a machine that generates voice particles into a voice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not sure what a “voice particle” is. A “voice” is heard by your ear due to fluctuations in air pressure changes. Your vocal cords vibrate as the air passes by them and combined with your mouth shape a vibration travels thru the air to someones ear drum and the vibrations are convertred to a electric signal to your brain and gets understood. There is no particle floating in the air.
